result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Vernell C Anderson Jr.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Vernell C Anderson Jr. not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Kylan Reilly in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.

Defendant Vernell C Anderson Jr. not in court. Attorney Abigial Doweiko in court for the State of Wisconsin under the supervision of Thomas Potter under the student practice rule. Defendant has another case, 22CM2394, which has been set for an appearance in OCCR on 11/2/2022 at 1:00PM. Court adjourns this case to the same date and time to track with other case. State does not object. Case remains calendared in OCCR.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Vernell C Anderson Jr. not in court. 
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 10-28-2022.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
